detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with frills on the sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif on the front, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Short blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long, flared sleeves and a tassel-trimmed hem. Unlined.
Three-strand metal necklace with three different-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 41-48 cm.
Fitted jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Boxy jacket in airy cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pockets with a pleat and button, gently dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Boots in sturdy cotton canvas with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Platform front 4.5 cm, heel 6 cm.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Long shirt in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a boat neck and partially open back with a wrapover at the top and sewn-in ties lower down.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Moccasins in suede with a decorative seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber half-soles.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Slippers in jersey with motifs, and a loop at the back.Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Set with a top and joggers in cotton. Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short, straight off-the-shoulder dress in an airy viscose weave with elastication around the top, short raglan sleeves and embroidery on the sleeves and front.

Short, A-line dress in airy chiffon with heavy beaded embroidery. Stand-up collar, an opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Jersey lining from the bust downwards.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Slightly longer style with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Lightly padded, diamond-quilted gilet with a ribbed collar, zip down the front, side pockets and an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Contrasting colour lining.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Dress in mesh with buttons down the back, a seam at the waist and flared, double-layered skirt with embroidery. Frill trims on the front, around the armholes and at the hem. Lined.
Jersey fancy dress costume with an accessory, a print motif on the front and a hook and loop fastening at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with a hood with pompoms on the top. Zip down the front with a chin guard and long raglan sleeves. Lined.

Studio Collection. Long top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small, gathered stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and rounded hem.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing with a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at the back and reflective details.
Short viscose-blend dress in a striped weave with a V-neck, short, wide sleeves and a wide tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Padded ski mittens in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with elastication and a hook and loop fastener at the top. Reflective details and Thinsulate™ lining. Size 3-6 M without thumbs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Sleeveless dress in soft slub cotton jersey with a lace-covered bodice at the front, gathered seam at the waist and skirt that is slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a very wide skirt with an underskirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Derby shoes with pointed toes and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Metal hoop earrings, one pair decorated with rhinestones. Diameter 2 cm and 2.4 cm.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a concealed zip at the back and a raw-edge hem. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide hem. Light support. Seamless.
Joggers in a soft fine-knit cashmere and organic cotton blend. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.

Set with a top and leggings in soft cotton. Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and short slits in the sides.Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Chest pocket with a print motif.
Sandals with wrapover straps at the front and elastication in the sides. Imitation leather linings and insoles, and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Short coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Cropped top in soft viscose jersey with a stand-up collar and short sleeves. Vertical, overlocked seams down the front and back, and overlocked edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a zip at the top. Zip down the front,flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped chest pocket, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elasticated ribbing with a text print at the cuffs and hem.

Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded collar in woven fabric, an opening and button at the back of the neck and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Added layer in a cotton weave at the hem.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Wrapover key pocket at the top, ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees, and reflective details.

Dress in patterned, lightweight twill with flounces down the front that continue over the back and buttons at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a frill-trimmed V-neck and an open front with narrow ties. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Leather sandals with padded, wrapover straps. Leather insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Metal Alice band with attachments on the top.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long wrap dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back and short flounced sleeves. Flounced trim around the V-neck at the back, a seam and narrow tie belt at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Lined.

Body in jersey with a sheen. Relaxed fit at the top with a deep V-neck, a draped wrapover front, and a gathered seam at the shoulders. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined patterned bikini with flounces at the top. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a small metal decoration at one side. Matching bikini bottoms.
Top in printed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour, ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and tapered legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Hat in a rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top and a turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey with a button placket, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric containing some wool with notch lapels, flap front pockets and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
